abstract: Brooklyn Community Services, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Thomas Torres pay for driving lessons so that he can obtain license.

headline.print_headline: Stranger’s Words Help a Depressed Man Find Purpose and Aid Others
headline.main: Depression Leaves a Man Adrift, but a Stranger Helps Him Find Purpose

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: A Brooklyn man was managing schizophrenia despite a diagnosis at 13. But he continued to struggle with depression, giving up on his education until a chance encounter.
